Class GenerateLattice

java.lang.Object
utilities.GenerateLattice
@Deprecated public class GenerateLattice extends Object
Deprecated.
because the creation of the system has been moved to Lattice
Generates an array of spinSpin objects that represents a crystal system

  • Method Details

    • generate_ising_lattice

      public static singleSpin[] generate_ising_lattice​(int Lx, int Lz, double dilution, double h, org.apache.commons.math3.random.MersenneTwister rnd_spin)
      Deprecated.
      Generates a singleSpin array
      Parameters:
      Lx - - Number of unit cells in x and in y directions
      Lz - - Number of unit cells in z direction
      dilution - - Dilution of magnetic ions -- spins (x)
      h - - Random field parameter
      rnd_spin - - PRNG for random dilution. If null is given then an empty lattice will be returned (all spin 0) which still can be useful for Ewald summation.
      Returns:
      An array of spins that represent a Lx*Lx*Lz system

    • generate_ising_lattice

      public static singleSpin[] generate_ising_lattice​(int Lx, int Ly, int Lz, double dilution, double h, org.apache.commons.math3.random.MersenneTwister rnd_spin)
      Deprecated.
      Generates a singleSpin array
      Parameters:
      Lx - Number of unit cells in x direction
      Ly - Number of unit cells in y direction
      Lz - Number of unit cells in z direction
      dilution - Dilution of magnetic ions -- spins (x)
      h - Random field parameter
      rnd_spin - PRNG for random dilution. If null is given then an empty lattice will be returned (all spin 0) which still can be useful for Ewald summation.
      Returns:
      An array of spins that represent a Lx*Lx*Lz system
